How can I get involved with the NetFPGA project?

  • Register with the netfpga-announce mailing list to receive NetFPGA project announcements.
  • Visit the NetFPGA forum to ask and answer questions.
    • Youâ€™ll need to register on the forums to post questions and answers.
  • Become a fan on Facebook.

Where can I get a NetFPGA?

  • Pre-assembled desktop cube or rackmount PC with the NetFPGA card pre-installed.
  • Purchase NetFPGA 1G cards
  • Purchase NetFPGA 10G cards

How can I obtain the gateware and software package?

Instructions:

  • 10G Platform: Registration

Release Information:

  • 10G Platform: Releases

Once you have used the NetFPGA, we hope that you will contribute to the project.
